channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 7, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

Aug 21, 20:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, change is scheduled on our API.
âš  API change
The 7th of October 2025, the following API calls will be definitely removed:
- All API calls under /me/installationTemplate
- POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start.
Customers can migrate to its successor POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/reinstall.

Start time: 07/10/2025 08:30 UTC
End time: 07/10/2025 08:45 UTC
Service impact: None
More details about the change: End of life for personal installation templates.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SGP][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple Racks maintenance Notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 24, 12:00 - 18:00 UTC

Aug 26, 15:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 24/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 24/09/2025 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in racks 040722B, 040820A, 040821B, 040821A will be unreachable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from the specified racks.
A specific communication will be sent to the impacted customer.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA3][Network] - Rack GRA0321A03B
item.description:

item.title: [BHS/GRA][Managed Services] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
item.description:

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC

For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 9, 18:00 - 19:00 UTC

Sep 3, 20:20 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 09/09/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 09/09/2025 19:00 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts :

- Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
- Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

item.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack LIM0310A01C incident notification

Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
